recent.title: Do You Actually Need to Retire?
recent.subtitle: What if the question isn't how to retire early — but why you want to escape your life?
recent.description: A deeply personal exploration of what retirement really means, the case for and against early retirement, and whether freedom matters more than not working.

recent.title: Can I Retire at 35 with $500k?
recent.subtitle: Every strategy simulated — from S&P 500 withdrawals to real estate, JEPI, and geo-arbitrage
recent.description: Can you retire at 35 with $500,000? We run every scenario — from the safest withdrawal strategies to real estate, dividend ETFs, geo-arbitrage, and hybrid approaches.

recent.title: From $6,000/Month in NYC to $1,100 Abroad: My Geo-Arbitrage Experiment
recent.subtitle: How I cut my expenses by 82% without sacrificing quality of life
recent.description: A detailed breakdown of how I went from spending $6,000/month in New York City to living comfortably on $1,100/month through geographic arbitrage.

recent.title: Here's how you can save upto $500 each month
recent.subtitle: And retire years earlier than you thought you could
